Title: Relates to precluding inadmissible statements made by defendants because of false information and requires data collection of recorded interrogations
Summary: Relates to precluding inadmissible statements made by defendants because of false facts about evidence or because of a statement that undermines the reliability of the defendant's statement and requires data collection and analysis by the division of criminal justice services of recorded interrogations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to defendants' statement admissibility and recorded interrogations
